category.name: category-add
category.description: Add reaction roles to a specific category.

category.name: category-create
category.description: Create a new category to categorize your reaction roles in.

category.name: category-edit
category.description: Edit any category's name, description, or if it's mutually exclusive.

category.name: category-list
category.description: List all your categories and the roles within them.

category.name: category-remove
category.description: Delete a category. Deleting a category frees all roles it contains.

category.name: category-update
category.description: Have an existing react role embed you want updated? Use this command!

general.name: auto-join
general.description: Setup auto join roles for the server.

general.name: tutorial
general.description: Need to learn the basics of RoleBot? Use this command!

react.name: react-channel
react.description: Send all categories with react roles to the selected channel.

react.name: react-clean
react.description: If you delete a role RoleBot might miss it, this will remove '@deleted' roles.

react.name: react-create
react.description: Create a new react role. Give the command a role and an emoji. It really is that simple.

react.name: react-list
react.description: List all reaction roles that are currently active.

react.name: react-message
react.description: Use this command to react with a specific category of roles to a message.

react.name: react-nuke
react.description: This will remove ALL react roles for this server.

react.name: react-remove
react.description: Remove an existing reaction role from a drop down menu.
